TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlAnyElementAttributes extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type XmlAnyElementAttributes = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable interface IList
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlAnyElementAttributes extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

summary.span: 表示 对象集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 可以重写一组对象的行为 。Use the to override the behavior of a set of objects. 只要每个实例具有不同的属性值，就可以将类的多个实例应用于类成员 ; 这将指示将 命名元素下的未知元素收集到适当的数组中。Multiple instances of the class can be applied to a class member, as long as each instance has a distinct property value; this instructs the to collect unknown elements under the named element into the appropriate array. 出于此原因，可以将类的多个实例 添加到中 。It is for this reason that multiple instances of the class can be added to the . 重写一组 对象：To override a set of objects: 1. 创建一个 。Create an . 2. 创建一组 对象，并使用方法将每个对象添加到集合中 。Create the set of objects, and add each object to the collection using the method. 3. 创建一个 。Create an . 4. 将 属性设置为 。Set the property to the . 5. 创建一个 。Create an . 6. 使用方法将添加到 。Add the to the using the method. 7. 使用创建的实例 。Create an instance of the using the . 8. 序列化或反序列化包含对象集的对象 。Serialize or deserialize an object that contains the set of objects. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新的 ，并将其添加到通过属性访问的对象的集合中 。The following example creates a new and adds it to the collection of objects accessed through the property. 然后，将 添加到 用于创建的 。The is then added to a which is used to create an . 用于对对象进行序列化或反序列化。The is used to serialize or deserialize an object. 若要查看使用属性的效果 ，请在方法中运行方法来创建名为 UnknownElements.xml 的 XML 文档 `SerializeObject` `Main` 。To see the effect of using the property, create an XML document named UnknownElements.xml by running the `SerializeObject` method in the `Main` method. 编辑生成的文档以包含其他 (未知) 元素。Edit the resulting document to include other (unknown) elements. 注释掉 `SerializeObject` 方法中的调用 `Main` ，取消注释对方法的调用 `DeserializeObject` ，该方法输出任何未知 XML 元素的名称和值。Comment out the `SerializeObject` call in the `Main` method, and uncomment the call to the `DeserializeObject` method, which prints out the name and value of any unknown XML element. [!code-cpp[XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements/CPP/xmlanyover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements/CS/xmlanyover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements/VB/xmlanyover.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新的 ，并将其添加到通过属性访问的对象的集合中 。The following example creates a new and adds it to the collection of objects accessed through the property. 然后，将添加到 用于创建的 。The is then added to an , which is used to create an . 用于对对象进行序列化或反序列化。The is used to serialize or deserialize an object. 若要查看使用属性的效果 ，请在方法中运行方法来创建名为 UnknownElements.xml 的 XML 文档 `SerializeObject` `Main` 。To see the effect of using the property, create an XML document named UnknownElements.xml by running the `SerializeObject` method in the `Main` method. 编辑生成的文档以包含其他 (未知) 元素。Edit the resulting document to include other (unknown) elements. 注释掉 `SerializeObject` 方法中的调用 `Main` ，取消注释对方法的调用 `DeserializeObject` ，该方法输出任何未知 XML 元素的名称和值。Comment out the `SerializeObject` call in the `Main` method, and uncomment the call to the `DeserializeObject` method, which prints out the name and value of any unknown XML element.
